data.content:
Corki (Hot Rod Corki)

RP Cost: 1820 RP

Release Date: November 19, 2010

Hot Rod Corki is a legendary skin for the champion Corki in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on November 19, 2010, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1820 RP. With its unique design and fiery theme, Hot Rod Corki offers players a visually stunning and exciting experience.

The Hot Rod Corki skin transforms the Yordle pilot into a speed-loving daredevil, ready to race through the Summoner's Rift in style. Corki's usual aircraft, the Gyrocopter, is replaced with a sleek and vibrant hot rod, complete with flaming exhaust pipes and a roaring engine. The skin features a red and yellow color scheme, reminiscent of classic hot rods from the 1950s.

Not only does Hot Rod Corki change Corki's appearance, but it also brings new animations and visual effects to the game. Corki's abilities are enhanced with fiery effects, making his rockets and bombs even more explosive. The sound effects are also modified to match the theme, adding to the overall immersive experience of playing as Hot Rod Corki.

Corki, the Daring Bombardier, is a versatile marksman champion in League of Legends. He is known for his ability to deal both physical and magic damage, making him a threat to both tanks and squishy targets. Corki's playstyle revolves around his ability to poke enemies from a distance and quickly burst them down with his arsenal of rockets and bombs.

In terms of strengths, Corki excels in the mid to late game, where he can dish out massive amounts of damage. His passive ability, Hextech Munitions, converts a percentage of his basic attacks to deal bonus true damage, making him a formidable opponent. Corki's ultimate ability, Missile Barrage, allows him to rain down rockets from the sky, dealing damage to multiple enemies at once.

However, Corki also has his weaknesses. He is relatively weak in the early game and can be easily bullied by aggressive laners. Corki relies heavily on his abilities, which have high mana costs, making him susceptible to mana constraints if not managed properly. Additionally, Corki's damage is primarily ability-based, so he may struggle against champions with high magic resistance.

In the world of League of Legends, Corki is a renowned pilot and member of the Yordle Expeditionary Corps. He hails from the city-state of Bandle City and is known for his fearless nature and love for flying. Corki's Gyrocopter, the Hextech Bomber, is his trusty aircraft, equipped with an array of deadly weapons.

Corki's past in the game is filled with memorable moments and achievements. He has been a staple pick in professional play, known for his high burst damage and ability to carry games. Corki has received several balance changes and updates over the years to ensure fair gameplay and keep him in line with other champions.

If you want to explore all the appearances of Corki in League of Legends, including the Hot Rod Corki skin, you can find more information and videos on this page. Whether you're a fan of Corki's daring personality or simply enjoy his explosive playstyle, Hot Rod Corki is a skin that adds a touch of excitement and style to your League of Legends experience.

Corki (Ice Toboggan Corki)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: December 17, 2009

Ice Toboggan Corki is a skin for the champion Corki in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on December 17, 2009, and is available for purchase at a cost of 975 RP. It offers a unique and icy twist to Corki's appearance, transforming him into a winter-themed pilot ready to take to the skies.

The Ice Toboggan Corki skin features a complete overhaul of Corki's visual design, replacing his usual pilot outfit with a cozy winter ensemble. Corki is dressed in a warm, fur-lined aviator jacket, complete with matching gloves and boots. His iconic goggles are replaced with snow goggles, and his trusty aircraft, the Gyrocopter, is transformed into a snowmobile-like vehicle, complete with skis and a toboggan attached to the back.

The attention to detail in this skin is impressive, with snowflakes falling around Corki as he soars through the air. The toboggan attached to the Gyrocopter leaves a trail of snow behind it, adding to the winter theme. The overall color scheme of the skin is predominantly white and blue, further emphasizing the icy aesthetic.

Now, let's delve into the story of Corki and his place in the League of Legends universe. Corki, also known as the Daring Bombardier, is a yordle pilot hailing from the city-state of Bandle City. He is a fearless and skilled pilot, always ready for an adventure. Corki's passion lies in flying and exploring the world, and he is often seen as a symbol of freedom and adventure.

In the game, Corki is classified as a marksman, specializing in dealing damage from a distance. He relies on his trusty Gyrocopter to rain down destruction on his enemies, utilizing a variety of rockets and bombs. Corki's abilities include Phosphorus Bomb, which allows him to drop a bomb that reveals and damages enemies in an area, and Valkyrie, which propels him and his Gyrocopter forward while damaging enemies in his path.

Corki's strengths lie in his ability to poke and harass enemies from a safe distance. His long-range rockets and bombs make him a formidable opponent in the laning phase, allowing him to whittle down his enemies' health before engaging in an all-out fight. Additionally, Corki's mobility with Valkyrie gives him the ability to quickly reposition himself in team fights, making him difficult to catch and allowing him to deal damage from unexpected angles.

However, Corki also has his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage compared to other marksmen. While his burst damage can be significant, Corki's damage output diminishes over time, making him less effective in extended fights. Additionally, Corki's reliance on his abilities means that he can quickly run out of mana if not managed properly, leaving him vulnerable and unable to contribute to fights.

In the lore of League of Legends, Corki has had various adventures and encounters with other champions. He has been involved in conflicts such as the Noxian-Ionian War and the Battle of Freljord. Corki's charismatic personality and love for exploration have made him a beloved character among players.

If you want to learn more about Corki and his various appearances in the game, you can find detailed information and videos on this page. Whether it's his classic look or his icy transformation with the Ice Toboggan Corki skin, Corki is a champion that brings excitement and adventure to the world of League of Legends.

Corki (Urfrider Corki)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: April 1, 2010

Corki, the Daring Bombardier, is a fearless pilot who takes to the skies in his trusty aircraft, the Gyrocopter. With his arsenal of explosive weaponry, Corki is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. One of his most iconic and beloved skins is Urfrider Corki, which transforms him into a quirky and whimsical character.

Urfrider Corki is a legendary skin that was released on April 1, 2010, as part of the April Fools' Day celebration in League of Legends. Priced at 975 RP, this skin offers players a unique and comical twist on Corki's usual appearance.

The skin features Corki riding a mechanical version of Urf, the Manatee, who is a beloved and iconic creature in the League of Legends universe. Urf is known for his playful and mischievous nature, and his inclusion in this skin adds a touch of humor and charm to Corki's character.

Urfrider Corki showcases a vibrant and colorful design, with Corki donning a helmet and goggles, ready to take flight. The mechanical Urf is intricately detailed, complete with propellers and a saddle for Corki to sit on. The skin also includes unique visual and sound effects, such as Urf's distinct honking noise when Corki fires his abilities.

As a champion, Corki has a rich backstory within the League of Legends lore. He hails from the city-state of Bandle City, home to the yordles, a race of small, furry creatures with a penchant for mischief. Corki, however, is not your typical yordle. He is a skilled pilot and an expert in aerial combat.

Corki's passion for flying led him to create the Gyrocopter, a nimble aircraft armed with an array of deadly weapons. With his trusty machine, Corki became a renowned pilot, defending Bandle City from any threats that came its way. He quickly gained a reputation as a daring and fearless bombardier.

In the game, Corki is classified as a marksman, specializing in dealing damage from a distance. He relies on his abilities and basic attacks to whittle down his opponents, making him a formidable force in team fights. Corki's abilities include Phosphorus Bomb, which deals area of effect damage and reveals enemies, and Valkyrie, which allows him to dash through the air, damaging and slowing enemies in his path.

One of Corki's unique traits is his ability to deal both physical and magic damage, making it difficult for opponents to itemize against him effectively. This hybrid damage allows Corki to adapt to different situations and keep his enemies guessing.

While Corki has many strengths, he also has his fair share of weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks mobility compared to some other marksmen. This makes positioning crucial for Corki players, as being caught out of position can quickly lead to his demise. Additionally, Corki's damage output relies heavily on his abilities, so managing his mana pool is essential to maximize his effectiveness.

Overall, Corki is a versatile and exciting champion to play, offering a unique playstyle with his aerial abilities and hybrid damage. Whether you're a fan of his lore, his playstyle, or simply enjoy his quirky personality, Urfrider Corki is a skin that adds a touch of whimsy and fun to your League of Legends experience.

For more information about Corki and his various appearances, including videos showcasing his abilities and skins, be sure to visit this page.

Corki (Fnatic Corki)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: November 14, 2011

Corki, the Daring Bombardier, is a versatile marksman in the popular online game League of Legends. With his unique ability to soar through the skies and rain down destruction upon his enemies, Corki has become a fan-favorite champion. One of his most iconic skins is the

skin, which pays homage to the professional League of Legends team Fnatic.

Released on November 14, 2011, the Fnatic Corki skin is available for purchase in the in-game store for 975 RP. This skin transforms Corki's appearance, giving him a sleek and modern look inspired by the Fnatic team colors and branding. With its vibrant orange and black color scheme, the Fnatic Corki skin stands out on the battlefield, making Corki a true representation of the Fnatic spirit.

The Fnatic Corki skin features several visual changes that enhance the overall aesthetic of the champion. Corki's aircraft, the Hextech Bomber, receives a complete makeover, with new decals and paint job showcasing the Fnatic logo and colors. The rockets fired by Corki are also modified to match the theme, leaving a trail of orange and black smoke as they soar through the air. Additionally, Corki himself dons a Fnatic-themed pilot suit, complete with the team's logo emblazoned on his chest.

As a champion, Corki has a rich backstory within the League of Legends universe. Hailing from the city-state of Bandle City, Corki is a Yordle who has a passion for flying and explosives. He is known as the Daring Bombardier due to his fearless nature and his ability to pilot his custom-built aircraft, the Hextech Bomber. Corki's skills as a pilot and his mastery of explosives make him a formidable force on the battlefield.

In the game, Corki is classified as a marksman, specializing in dealing sustained damage from a distance. His abilities allow him to poke at enemies from afar and quickly reposition himself with his Valkyrie ability. Corki's passive ability, Hextech Munitions, adds bonus damage to his basic attacks, making him a threat in both the early and late game. His ultimate ability, Missile Barrage, allows him to rain down rockets on his enemies, dealing massive area-of-effect damage.

While Corki has many strengths, he also has a few weaknesses. One of his main weaknesses is his reliance on mana, as his abilities consume a significant amount of it. This means that Corki players need to manage their resources carefully to avoid running out of mana during crucial moments. Additionally, Corki's damage output is primarily magic damage, which can be mitigated by opponents building magic resistance. This makes it important for Corki players to adapt their build and playstyle based on the enemy team composition.

Throughout his time in the game, Corki has seen various changes and updates to his abilities and gameplay. However, his core identity as a daring pilot with a love for explosives remains unchanged. The Fnatic Corki skin adds an extra layer of personality to the champion, allowing players to showcase their support for the Fnatic team while dominating the Rift.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Corki's appearances, including the Fnatic Corki skin. Whether you're a fan of Corki or a fan of Fnatic, this skin is a must-have for any dedicated player. Soar through the skies and rain down destruction with Corki's Fnatic Corki skin!

Corki (Default)

RP Cost: N/A

Release Date: N/A

Corki, the Daring Bombardier, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. As one of the original champions released in the game, Corki has become a beloved and iconic character among players. His default skin, simply known as

is the original appearance of Corki and showcases his unique and charismatic design.

The Default skin for Corki features him as a daring pilot, ready to take to the skies in his trusty aircraft, the Gyrocopter. Corki himself is a Yordle, a small and furry creature known for their mischievous nature. He is depicted wearing a pilot's helmet, goggles, and a flight suit, complete with various patches and insignias. His Gyrocopter is a marvel of engineering, with rotating blades and a sleek design that reflects Corki's adventurous spirit.

The attention to detail in Corki's Default skin is impressive. From the intricate stitching on his flight suit to the weathered look of his aircraft, every aspect of the design adds to the overall charm and personality of the character. The vibrant colors used in the skin, such as the bright orange of Corki's flight suit and the contrasting blue of his Gyrocopter, make him stand out on the battlefield.

Corki's Default skin perfectly captures his essence as a daring and skilled pilot. It showcases his love for adventure and his unwavering determination to protect his homeland, Valoran. As a member of the Yordle Expeditionary Force, Corki is always ready to take on any challenge that comes his way, whether it be battling enemy champions or defending his allies.

In terms of gameplay, Corki is a versatile marksman who excels at dealing both physical and magic damage. His abilities revolve around his Gyrocopter, allowing him to unleash devastating attacks from the skies. Corki's passive ability, Hextech Munitions, enhances his basic attacks by dealing bonus true damage. His Q ability, Phosphorus Bomb, allows him to drop a bomb that reveals enemies and deals damage in an area. Valkyrie, his W ability, enables him to dash in a target direction, leaving a trail of fire that damages enemies. Corki's E ability, Gatling Gun, unleashes a barrage of bullets that shreds through enemy armor. Finally, his ultimate ability, Missile Barrage, fires a barrage of missiles at a target location, dealing massive damage.

Corki's strengths lie in his ability to poke and harass enemies from a safe distance. His long-range abilities, combined with his mobility, make him a formidable opponent in the laning phase. Additionally, Corki's mixed damage allows him to bypass enemy resistances, making it difficult for opponents to itemize against him effectively. His ultimate ability, Missile Barrage, is particularly devastating in team fights, as it can deal significant damage to multiple targets.

However, Corki also has his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustain, making him vulnerable to all-ins and burst damage. Additionally, Corki's abilities have high mana costs, which can limit his ability to spam spells in the early game. His reliance on his ultimate ability for significant damage also means that he has periods of downtime between missile barrages.

In the lore of League of Legends, Corki is a renowned pilot and a member of the Yordle Expeditionary Force. He hails from Bandle City, the homeland of the Yordles, and has dedicated his life to defending Valoran from various threats. Corki's Gyrocopter, the Hextech Munitions Platform, is a marvel of Yordle engineering and is equipped with an arsenal of powerful weapons.

Corki's adventures have taken him to various parts of Runeterra, where he has faced off against dangerous creatures and rival factions. He has formed alliances with other champions, such as Heimerdinger and Tristana, and has become a respected figure in the League of Legends universe.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Corki, including his various skins. Each skin offers a unique visual and thematic twist to the character, allowing players to customize their Corki experience. Whether you prefer the classic look of the Default skin or want to explore other exciting options, Corki's skins offer something for everyone.

Corki: The Daring Bombardier

Release Date: September 19, 2009

Corki, also known as the Daring Bombardier, is a versatile marksman in the popular online multiplayer game, League of Legends. With his unique blend of aerial combat and explosive firepower, Corki has become a beloved champion among players. In this article, we will delve into Corki's story, his strengths and weaknesses, his background in the game, and his significant role in the League of Legends universe.

Background Story

Corki hails from the city-state of Bandle City, a place inhabited by yordles, small magical creatures with a penchant for adventure. Unlike his fellow yordles, Corki developed a fascination with technology and engineering, particularly with flying machines. He dedicated his life to creating the most advanced aircraft in all of Runeterra.

Equipped with his trusty personal aircraft, the Gyrocopter, Corki embarked on daring missions, exploring uncharted territories and defending his homeland from various threats. His aerial prowess and innovative weaponry quickly earned him the title of the Daring Bombardier.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Corki possesses a unique set of strengths and weaknesses that make him a formidable champion on the Fields of Justice. His primary strength lies in his ability to deal mixed damage, making it difficult for opponents to itemize against him effectively. Corki's basic attacks deal both physical and magic damage, allowing him to bypass certain defensive measures.

Furthermore, Corki's arsenal includes a range of powerful abilities. His Q ability,
allows him to unleash a missile that reveals enemies and deals area-of-effect magic damage. His W ability,
grants him a short burst of speed and the ability to fly over terrain, making him elusive and difficult to catch. Additionally, his E ability,

shreds enemy armor and magic resistance, increasing his overall damage output.

However, Corki does have some weaknesses that players must be mindful of. He is relatively squishy compared to other marksmen, meaning he can be easily burst down if caught out of position. Additionally, Corki relies heavily on his abilities for damage, making him mana-dependent in the early stages of the game. Proper mana management is crucial to ensure he can consistently dish out damage.

In-Game Role

Corki is primarily played in the bot lane as an AD carry, where he can farm gold and experience alongside a support champion. His range and ability to poke enemies from a distance make him a strong laner, capable of harassing opponents and securing kills with the help of his support.

As the game progresses, Corki's power spikes in the mid-game, where he can make use of his abilities to deal significant damage in team fights. His ultimate ability,

allows him to fire a barrage of missiles from his aircraft, dealing massive damage to multiple enemies. This ability, combined with his mixed damage output, makes Corki a threat to both squishy targets and tankier champions.

Furthermore, Corki's mobility with his W ability,

grants him the ability to reposition quickly in team fights or escape dangerous situations. This mobility, coupled with his burst damage, makes him a versatile and unpredictable champion.

Skins

On our website, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Corki's skins. From the classic
where he dons a World War I-inspired pilot outfit, to the futuristic

complete with neon lights and pixelated explosions, each skin offers a unique visual experience. Whether you prefer a more traditional look or enjoy the whimsical and imaginative designs, Corki's skins provide players with a chance to personalize their champion and stand out on the battlefield.

Visit our website to explore all the available skins for Corki and witness the visual transformations that await you.

In conclusion, Corki, the Daring Bombardier, brings a mix of aerial combat, explosive firepower, and technological innovation to the world of League of Legends. With his unique abilities and versatile playstyle, Corki has secured a place as a beloved champion among players. Whether you're looking to dominate the bot lane or rain down missiles on your enemies, Corki is a champion that offers excitement and strategic depth. So, gear up, take to the skies, and let Corki's bombs rain down upon your foes!

Corki (Corgi Corki)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: August 29, 2019

League of Legends is known for its diverse and imaginative skins, and one of the most adorable additions to the game is Corki's

skin. Released on August 29, 2019, this skin brings a whole new level of cuteness to the battlefield. Let's dive into the story behind this delightful costume and explore all the details that make it so special.

The Story of Corgi Corki

In this alternate universe, Corki, the daring pilot of the Yordle Expeditionary Force, finds himself transformed into an adorable Corgi. Equipped with a tiny aviator hat and goggles, Corgi Corki takes to the skies in his trusty Corgi-themed aircraft, ready to spread joy and cuteness wherever he goes.

The attention to detail in this skin is remarkable. Corki's usual aircraft is transformed into a whimsical Corgi-shaped plane, complete with floppy ears and a wagging tail. The propellers are replaced with spinning bones, and the exhaust emits colorful bubbles instead of smoke. Corgi Corki himself is irresistibly cute, with his fluffy fur and wagging tail. His aviator hat and goggles add the perfect finishing touch to his adorable appearance.

But it's not just the visual design that makes Corgi Corki special. The skin also features unique animations and sound effects. When Corki uses his Q ability, Phosphorus Bomb, he throws a squeaky toy instead of a bomb, and the explosion is accompanied by a playful

His W ability, Valkyrie, leaves behind a trail of paw prints as he zooms through the air. Even his recall animation is a treat to watch, as Corgi Corki curls up for a nap with a bone-shaped pillow.

Corki's Story and Gameplay

Corki, the Daring Bombardier, has been a part of League of Legends since its early days. He is a ranged AD carry who excels at dealing sustained damage from a safe distance. With his arsenal of explosive abilities and his trusty aircraft, Corki is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.

Originally hailing from Bandle City, Corki is a Yordle who has a passion for flying and a knack for inventing powerful weapons. He joined the Yordle Expeditionary Force and became their most skilled pilot, using his aircraft to rain down destruction on his enemies. Corki's ultimate ability, Missile Barrage, allows him to fire a barrage of missiles from his aircraft, dealing massive damage to multiple targets.

In terms of gameplay, Corki is known for his strong poke and burst damage. His Q ability, Phosphorus Bomb, allows him to damage and reveal enemies in an area, making it a great tool for scouting and harassing. His W ability, Valkyrie, provides him with an escape mechanism, allowing him to quickly reposition himself in team fights. Corki's E ability, Gatling Gun, shreds through enemy armor, making him a formidable threat to tanks and bruisers. And as mentioned earlier, his ultimate ability, Missile Barrage, can turn the tide of a team fight with its high damage output.

However, Corki does have his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks mobility compared to some other AD carries. Additionally, his abilities have high mana costs, which can make him mana-hungry in the early game. Corki's playstyle requires good positioning and careful resource management to maximize his damage output.

In the world of League of Legends, Corki has become a beloved champion among players. His unique design, charming personality, and explosive playstyle have made him a fan favorite. Whether you're a fan of his classic look or the adorable Corgi Corki skin, there's no denying the impact Corki has had on the game.

Explore Corki's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Corki and his various appearances in League of Legends, you're in luck! You can find detailed information, videos, and images of all his skins, including the delightful Corgi Corki, on this page. Whether you're a collector or simply appreciate the creativity and craftsmanship that goes into designing these skins, there's something for everyone to enjoy.

So, whether you're soaring through the skies as the daring Bombardier or spreading cuteness as the adorable Corgi Corki, Corki is a champion that brings excitement and joy to the world of League of Legends. Embrace the spirit of adventure and take to the skies with this fearless Yordle!

Corki (Astronaut Corki)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: July 9, 2015

League of Legends is known for its diverse range of champions and their unique skins. One such skin that stands out is

This skin takes our beloved yordle pilot, Corki, on an intergalactic adventure, transforming him into an astronaut ready to explore the cosmos. With its futuristic design and space-themed abilities, Astronaut Corki is a must-have skin for any Corki enthusiast.

The Astronaut Corki skin was released on July 9, 2015, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP. This skin offers a complete visual overhaul for Corki, giving him a sleek astronaut suit, complete with a helmet and jetpack. The attention to detail in this skin is remarkable, with intricate textures and vibrant colors that truly bring the space explorer theme to life.

Not only does Astronaut Corki look amazing, but it also comes with unique visual and sound effects. When using his abilities, Corki's rockets are transformed into futuristic laser beams, and his ultimate ability, the Missile Barrage, launches a barrage of rockets that leave behind a trail of stardust. The sound effects are also modified to match the space theme, adding an extra layer of immersion to the skin.

Now, let's delve into the story behind Astronaut Corki. In the vast universe of League of Legends, Corki is a daring yordle pilot who hails from the city-state of Bandle City. He is known for his exceptional piloting skills and his trusty aircraft, the Gyrocopter. Corki's passion for flying and exploration led him to become a member of the Valoran Space Program, where he embarked on numerous missions to uncover the mysteries of the cosmos.

During one of his space expeditions, Corki stumbled upon an ancient alien artifact that granted him incredible powers. This artifact, known as the

infused Corki's Gyrocopter with celestial energy, allowing him to traverse the stars with ease. Inspired by his newfound abilities and the wonders of the universe, Corki decided to create a special astronaut suit for himself, transforming into Astronaut Corki.

Astronaut Corki's strengths lie in his ability to dominate the skies. With his Gyrocopter, he can rain down rockets upon his enemies, dealing massive damage from a safe distance. His Valkyrie ability allows him to quickly reposition himself, making him a slippery target to catch. Additionally, his passive ability, Hextech Munitions, empowers his basic attacks, making him a formidable force in both team fights and one-on-one duels.

However, like any champion, Corki also has his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks crowd control abilities, making him vulnerable to crowd control effects and burst damage. Additionally, Corki heavily relies on his abilities and mana pool, so managing his resources effectively is crucial for success. Despite these weaknesses, Corki's high damage output and mobility make him a valuable asset to any team composition.

In the world of League of Legends, Corki has had a significant presence since his release in 2009. He has become a staple pick in the bot lane as an AD carry, thanks to his ability to deal both physical and magic damage. Corki's unique hybrid damage allows him to bypass traditional armor-focused builds, making him a versatile pick against various team compositions.

Over the years, Corki has received several skins, each offering a different theme and visual experience. From the classic Red Baron Corki to the futuristic Arcade Corki, players have a wide range of options to choose from. However, Astronaut Corki stands out as one of the most visually stunning and thematically unique skins in Corki's collection.

On this page, you can find detailed information about Astronaut Corki, including videos showcasing his abilities and animations. Whether you're a fan of Corki or simply appreciate well-crafted skins, Astronaut Corki is a must-have addition to your collection. So buckle up, put on your astronaut helmet, and get ready to explore the cosmos with Corki!

Corki (Red Baron Corki)

RP Cost: 1820 RP

Release Date: November 19, 2010

Corki, the Daring Bombardier, is a fearless pilot who takes to the skies in his trusty aircraft, the Gyrocopter. With his arsenal of explosive weaponry, Corki is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. One of his most iconic and sought-after skins is the

skin, which transforms him into a legendary World War I flying ace.

Released on November 19, 2010, the Red Baron Corki skin pays homage to the famous German fighter pilot, Manfred von Richthofen, also known as the Red Baron. This skin is a visual upgrade for Corki, giving him a new model, animations, and special effects that perfectly capture the essence of a daring aviator from the early 20th century.

Red Baron Corki dons a classic aviator outfit, complete with a leather flight cap, goggles, and a stylish red scarf. His Gyrocopter is transformed into a vintage biplane, complete with wooden propellers and a distinctive red paint job. The skin also features unique sound effects, including the roar of an engine and the whistling of wind as Corki soars through the air.

One of the standout features of the Red Baron Corki skin is the ability to toggle between two different modes for his ultimate ability, the Missile Barrage. In the default mode, Corki fires missiles from his biplane's wings, leaving a trail of smoke in their wake. However, when the Big One is ready, Corki can activate the alternate mode, causing his missiles to become larger and more powerful, leaving a fiery explosion in their path.

Red Baron Corki is not only visually impressive but also adds a touch of historical flair to the game. The skin's attention to detail and thematic elements make it a favorite among collectors and Corki enthusiasts alike.

The Story of Corki

Corki, the Daring Bombardier, hails from the city-state of Bandle City, home to the yordles. Despite his small stature, Corki possesses an insatiable curiosity and a love for adventure. He is known for his exceptional piloting skills and his unwavering determination to protect his homeland.

As a member of the Screaming Yipsnakes, an elite yordle air force, Corki is always ready for action. He takes to the skies in his custom-built Gyrocopter, armed with an array of deadly weapons. Corki's arsenal includes bombs, missiles, and even napalm, making him a formidable force in aerial combat.

In the world of League of Legends, Corki is a versatile marksman who excels at dealing damage from a distance. His abilities allow him to poke enemies with his rockets, shred through armor with his Gatling Gun, and deliver devastating barrages of missiles with his ultimate ability, the Missile Barrage.

While Corki may lack the raw power of some other champions, his mobility and range make him a formidable opponent. He can quickly reposition himself with his Valkyrie ability, allowing him to escape dangerous situations or engage in team fights with precision.

Throughout his time in the League of Legends, Corki has become a beloved champion among players. His unique playstyle and charismatic personality have endeared him to fans around the world. Whether he's soaring through the skies or raining down destruction from above, Corki is always ready for action.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Corki's appearances, including the iconic Red Baron Corki skin. Explore the different looks and abilities of this daring yordle pilot and take to the skies in style!

Corki (UFO Corki)

RP Cost: 520

Release Date: April 19, 2010

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions and their unique skins. One of the most iconic skins in the game is

which transforms the daring pilot Corki into an extraterrestrial being. Released on April 19, 2010, this skin has become a fan favorite due to its quirky design and playful nature.

UFO Corki is available for purchase in the in-game store for 520 Riot Points. With its affordable price, players can easily add this skin to their collection and enjoy the intergalactic adventures of Corki.

The Story of UFO Corki

UFO Corki takes the already eccentric pilot and propels him into the realm of science fiction. In this skin, Corki dons a futuristic spacesuit complete with a helmet and jetpack. His trusty aircraft, the Gyrocopter, is also transformed into a sleek UFO, complete with flashing lights and otherworldly sounds.

The inspiration behind UFO Corki comes from the idea of exploring the unknown and venturing into uncharted territories. Corki, known for his daring and adventurous spirit, embraces the extraterrestrial theme with enthusiasm. With his UFO-themed outfit and spacecraft, Corki is ready to take to the skies and conquer the battlefield.

Every aspect of UFO Corki's design is carefully crafted to reflect the theme. His spacesuit is adorned with intricate details, such as alien symbols and futuristic patterns. The jetpack on his back emits a vibrant blue flame, propelling him through the air with grace. The Gyrocopter, now a UFO, hovers above the ground, leaving a trail of stardust in its wake.

One of the standout features of UFO Corki is the unique sound effects. As Corki flies around the map, players can hear the distinct hum of a UFO, adding an extra layer of immersion to the skin. The sound effects perfectly complement the visual design, creating a cohesive and enjoyable experience for players.

Corki's Story and Gameplay

Corki, also known as the Daring Bombardier, is a ranged AD carry champion in League of Legends. He is a Yordle pilot who hails from the city-state of Bandle City. Corki's passion for flying and his exceptional piloting skills make him a formidable force on the battlefield.

In the game, Corki excels at dealing sustained damage from a distance. His abilities allow him to poke enemies, shred through armor, and deliver devastating missile barrages. Corki's ultimate ability,

allows him to rain down rockets from his aircraft, dealing massive damage to multiple targets.

While Corki's damage output is impressive, he is relatively squishy and lacks mobility compared to some other AD carries. This means that positioning and map awareness are crucial for Corki players. With proper positioning, Corki can safely dish out damage while avoiding enemy threats.

Corki's lore within the League of Legends universe is intertwined with the ongoing conflicts between the city-states of Runeterra. As a pilot, Corki has been involved in numerous battles, defending his homeland and fighting alongside his fellow Yordles. His bravery and skill have earned him a reputation as one of the most skilled pilots in the game.

Throughout his adventures, Corki has encountered various adversaries, including the Noxian forces led by General Swain and the monstrous Void creatures. Despite the dangers he faces, Corki remains undeterred, always ready to take to the skies and defend his allies.

With his UFO Corki skin, players can experience Corki's interstellar escapades in a whole new light. Whether it's zipping across the Summoner's Rift or engaging in epic team fights, UFO Corki brings a touch of whimsy and excitement to every game.

Corki (Dragonwing Corki)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: March 21, 2012

Dragonwing Corki is a legendary skin for the champion Corki in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on March 21, 2012, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 975 RP. With its unique design and visual effects, Dragonwing Corki offers players a fresh and exciting way to experience the game.

The Dragonwing Corki skin transforms Corki's appearance into a fearsome dragon rider. The skin features Corki wearing a dragon-themed pilot suit, complete with a dragon-shaped helmet and fiery red wings. The dragon motif is carried throughout the skin, with dragon scales adorning Corki's suit and dragon-inspired patterns on his weapons and abilities.

One of the standout features of Dragonwing Corki is the visual effects it brings to Corki's abilities. When using his Q ability, Phosphorus Bomb, Corki launches a dragon-shaped projectile that explodes upon impact. His W ability, Valkyrie, leaves behind a trail of fiery dragon wings as he dashes through the air. Additionally, his ultimate ability, Missile Barrage, fires dragon-shaped missiles that rain down on his enemies.

Dragonwing Corki not only offers a visually stunning experience but also adds a new level of immersion to playing Corki. The skin's unique design and effects make it a popular choice among players who want to stand out on the battlefield and showcase their style.

Corki's Story

Corki, known as the Daring Bombardier, is a yordle pilot hailing from the city-state of Bandle City. With his trusty flying machine, the Gyrocopter, Corki takes to the skies, engaging in daring aerial battles against his enemies. He is a fearless and skilled pilot, always ready to defend his homeland and seek out new adventures.

In the world of League of Legends, Corki is a versatile marksman who excels at dealing damage from a distance. His abilities allow him to rain down missiles, drop bombs, and strafe his enemies with machine gun fire. Corki's unique playstyle and arsenal of weapons make him a formidable force on the battlefield.

While Corki's primary role is that of a marksman, he also possesses some unique traits that set him apart from other champions. One of his defining features is his ability to deal both physical and magic damage, making it difficult for enemies to itemize against him effectively. Additionally, Corki's passive ability, Hextech Munitions, empowers every third basic attack to deal bonus true damage, further enhancing his damage output.

Throughout his journey in League of Legends, Corki has become a beloved champion among players. His charismatic personality, combined with his high-flying playstyle, has made him a fan favorite. Whether players are looking to dominate the bot lane or rain down destruction from the skies, Corki offers a unique and exciting gameplay experience.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Corki's appearances, including the Dragonwing Corki skin. Explore the different looks and abilities of this daring yordle pilot and discover the perfect style to suit your playstyle.

Corki (Arcade Corki)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: August 22, 2013

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions and their unique skins. One such skin that stands out is

This skin takes the daring pilot, Corki, and transforms him into a pixelated hero straight out of an arcade game. With vibrant colors, retro-inspired animations, and catchy sound effects, Arcade Corki brings a nostalgic charm to the Rift.

Arcade Corki was released on August 22, 2013, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP. This skin offers a complete visual overhaul for Corki, giving players a fresh and exciting way to experience the champion.

The Story of Arcade Corki

Arcade Corki's design draws inspiration from classic arcade games of the past. The skin features Corki as a pixelated pilot, complete with a retro flight suit and a pixelated mustache. His iconic aircraft, the Gyrocopter, is transformed into a pixelated arcade machine, complete with a joystick and buttons.

Every ability animation is reimagined with an arcade twist. Corki's Q ability, Phosphorus Bomb, is transformed into a pixelated bomb that explodes in a burst of colorful pixels upon impact. His W ability, Valkyrie, turns Corki into a pixelated rocket ship, leaving behind a trail of pixelated exhaust as he soars through the air. The E ability, Gatling Gun, replaces Corki's usual machine gun with a pixelated laser cannon, shooting bursts of pixelated energy at his enemies. Finally, Corki's ultimate ability, Missile Barrage, launches pixelated missiles that explode into a shower of pixels upon impact.

Not only do the abilities receive a visual overhaul, but the sound effects also add to the arcade theme. Each ability has a distinct retro sound, reminiscent of the blips and beeps of classic arcade games. The recall animation is particularly noteworthy, as Corki hops into his pixelated arcade machine and disappears in a flash of light, only to reappear moments later.

Corki's Story and Role in League of Legends

Corki, known as the Daring Bombardier, is a Yordle pilot who hails from the city-state of Bandle City. He is a fearless and skilled pilot, always ready to take to the skies in his trusty Gyrocopter. Corki's primary role in League of Legends is that of a marksman, dealing significant damage from a distance.

In the game, Corki's abilities revolve around his aircraft and arsenal of weapons. His Q ability, Phosphorus Bomb, allows him to drop a bomb that reveals enemies and deals damage in an area. His W ability, Valkyrie, propels Corki's Gyrocopter forward, granting him increased movement speed and leaving behind a trail of fire that damages enemies. The E ability, Gatling Gun, activates Corki's machine gun, allowing him to shred through enemy armor. Finally, his ultimate ability, Missile Barrage, launches a barrage of missiles at his enemies, dealing massive damage.

Corki's strengths lie in his ability to poke and harass enemies from a safe distance. His long-range abilities allow him to deal damage without putting himself in immediate danger. Additionally, Corki's mixed damage output, with both physical and magic damage, makes it difficult for enemies to itemize against him effectively.

However, Corki also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He is relatively squishy and lacks mobility compared to some other marksmen. This makes him vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Additionally, Corki's damage output relies heavily on hitting skill shots, so players must have good accuracy to maximize his potential.

In the lore of League of Legends, Corki has had various adventures and played a role in significant events. He has fought alongside other champions in battles against the Void, the Shadow Isles, and even the infamous Baron Nashor. Corki's bravery and skill have earned him a place among the champions of the League, where he continues to soar through the skies and fight for justice.
